Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near LaSalle/46th Place
ShortDescription: Eastbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, LaSalle, I-94  and 43rd: due to, street blockage near LaSalle/46th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, LaSalle, I-94  and 43rd: due to, street blockage near LaSalle/46th Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#62 Archer

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
